means: 银边翠（产于北美洲中部）

sentence.Network_en: Typically, the Norwegians were on the mountain two hours before anyone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 像往常一样，挪威人比其他所有人都提前两小时进山。

sentence.Network_en: a thick covering of snow on the ground
The blizzard struck while we were still on the mountain.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们还在山上的时候暴风雪就袭来了.

list.abs: the lotus on the snow mountain ., 冰山上的雪莲.
the morning sunrise is very nicely reflected on the mountain snow . it would be even better to employ a wider angle lens .这张照片中的朝霞映衬到白色雪山上很美，但如果作者能用更广的镜头去拍，照片的表现力会更强。
thousands died on the snow mountains .在雪山上死去的有成千上万。
